verses.verse: Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,
Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, cause Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> her abominations <S%H8441><s%>;

and say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%> unto Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>: Thy birth <S%H4351><s%> and thy nativity <S%H4138><s%> is of the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>; the Amorite <S%H567><s%> was thy father <S%H1><s%>, and thy mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite <S%H2850><s%>.

And as for thy nativity <S%H4138><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> thou wast born <S%H3205><s%> thy navel <S%H8270><s%> was not cut <S%H3772><s%>, neither wast thou washed <S%H7364><s%> in water <S%H4325><s%> to cleanse <S%H4935><s%> thee <S%H4414><s%>; thou wast not salted at all <S%H4414><s%>, nor swaddled <S%H2853><s%> at all <S%H2853><s%>.

No eye <S%H5869><s%> pitied <S%H2347><s%> thee <S%H6213><s%>, to do any <S%H259><s%> of these things unto thee <S%H2550><s%>, to have compassion upon thee <S%H7993><s%>; but thou wast cast out in the open <S%H6440><s%> field <S%H7704><s%>, for that thy person <S%H5315><s%> was abhorred <S%H1604><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou wast born <S%H3205><s%>.

And when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by thee <S%H7200><s%>, and saw thee weltering <S%H947><s%> in thy blood <S%H1818><s%>, I said <S%H559><s%> unto thee <S%H1818><s%>, Though thou art in thy blood, live <S%H2421><s%>; yea <S%H559><s%>, I said unto thee <S%H1818><s%>, Though thou art in thy blood, live <S%H2421><s%>.

I caused <S%H5414><s%> thee to multiply <S%H7233><s%> as that which groweth <S%H6780><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and thou didst increase <S%H7235><s%> and wax great <S%H1431><s%>, and thou attainedst <S%H935><s%> to excellent <S%H5716><s%> ornament <S%H5716><s%>; thy breasts <S%H7699><s%> were fashioned <S%H3559><s%>, and thy hair <S%H8181><s%> was grown <S%H6779><s%>; yet thou wast naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>.

Now when I passed <S%H5674><s%> by thee <S%H7200><s%>, and looked upon thee <S%H6256><s%>, behold, thy time was the time <S%H6256><s%> of love <S%H1730><s%>; and I spread <S%H6566><s%> my skirt <S%H3671><s%> over thee <S%H3680><s%>, and covered thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: yea <S%H7650><s%>, I sware unto thee <S%H935><s%>, and entered into a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with thee <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, and thou becamest mine.
Then washed <S%H7364><s%> I thee with water <S%H4325><s%>; yea <S%H7857><s%>, I thoroughly washed away thy blood <S%H1818><s%> from thee <S%H5480><s%>, and I anointed thee with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

I clothed <S%H3847><s%> thee also with broidered work <S%H7553><s%>, and shod <S%H5274><s%> thee with sealskin <S%H8476><s%>, and I girded <S%H2280><s%> thee about with fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> thee with silk <S%H4897><s%>.
And I decked <S%H5710><s%> thee with ornaments <S%H5716><s%>, and I put <S%H5414><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> upon thy hands <S%H3027><s%>, and a chain <S%H7242><s%> on thy neck <S%H1627><s%>.

And I put <S%H5414><s%> a ring <S%H5141><s%> upon thy nose <S%H639><s%>, and ear-rings <S%H5694><s%> in thine ears <S%H241><s%>, and a beautiful <S%H8597><s%> crown <S%H5850><s%> upon thy head <S%H7218><s%>.

Thus wast thou decked <S%H5710><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and silver <S%H3701><s%>; and thy raiment <S%H4403><s%> was of fine linen <S%H8336><s%>, and silk <S%H4897><s%>, and broidered work <S%H7553><s%>; thou didst eat <S%H398><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%>; and thou wast exceeding <S%H3966><s%> beautiful <S%H3302><s%>, and thou didst prosper <S%H6743><s%> unto royal estate <S%H4410><s%>.

And thy renown <S%H8034><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> for thy beauty <S%H3308><s%>; for it was perfect <S%H3632><s%>, through my majesty <S%H1926><s%> which I had put <S%H7760><s%> upon thee <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

But thou didst trust <S%H982><s%> in thy beauty <S%H3308><s%>, and playedst the harlot <S%H2181><s%> because of thy renown <S%H8034><s%>, and pouredst out <S%H8210><s%> thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> on every one that passed by <S%H5674><s%>; his it was.

And thou didst take <S%H3947><s%> of thy garments <S%H899><s%>, and madest for thee high places <S%H1116><s%> decked <S%H6213><s%> with divers colors <S%H2921><s%>, and playedst the harlot <S%H2181><s%> upon them <S%H935><s%>: the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

Thou didst also take <S%H3947><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of my gold <S%H2091><s%> and of my silver <S%H3701><s%>, which I had given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H6213><s%>, and madest for thee images <S%H6754><s%> of men <S%H2145><s%>, and didst play the harlot with them <S%H2181><s%>;

and thou tookest <S%H3947><s%> thy broidered <S%H7553><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>, and coveredst <S%H3680><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>, and didst set mine oil <S%H8081><s%> and mine incense <S%H7004><s%> before them <S%H6440><s%>.

My bread <S%H3899><s%> also which I gave <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H5560><s%>, fine flour, and oil <S%H8081><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>, wherewith I fed <S%H398><s%> thee <S%H5414><s%>, thou didst even set it before <S%H6440><s%> them for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%>; and thus it was <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

Moreover thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>, whom thou hast borne <S%H3205><s%> unto me <S%H2076><s%>, and these hast thou sacrificed unto them to be devoured <S%H398><s%>. Were thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> a small matter <S%H4592><s%>,
that thou hast slain <S%H7819><s%> my children <S%H1121><s%>, and delivered <S%H5414><s%> them up <S%H5674><s%>, in causing them to pass through the fire unto them?

And in all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> and thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> thou hast not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, when thou wast naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>, and wast weltering <S%H947><s%> in thy blood <S%H1818><s%>.
And it is come to pass after <S%H310><s%> all thy wickedness <S%H7451><s%>, (woe <S%H188><s%>, woe <S%H188><s%> unto thee <S%H5002><s%>! saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>,)
that thou hast built <S%H1129><s%> unto thee a vaulted place <S%H1354><s%>, and hast made <S%H6213><s%> thee a lofty place <S%H7413><s%> in every street <S%H7339><s%>.

Thou hast built <S%H1129><s%> thy lofty place <S%H7413><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of every way <S%H1870><s%>, and hast made thy beauty <S%H3308><s%> an abomination <S%H8581><s%>, and hast opened <S%H6589><s%> thy feet <S%H7272><s%> to every one that passed by <S%H5674><s%>, and multiplied <S%H7235><s%> thy whoredom <S%H8457><s%>.

Thou hast also committed fornication <S%H2181><s%> with the Egyptians <S%H1121><s%>, thy neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, great <S%H1432><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and hast multiplied <S%H7235><s%> thy whoredom <S%H8457><s%>, to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%>.

Behold therefore <S%H5186><s%>, I have stretched out my hand <S%H3027><s%> over thee <S%H1639><s%>, and have diminished thine ordinary <S%H2706><s%> food <S%H5414><s%>, and delivered thee unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> thee <S%H1323><s%>, the daughters of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, that are ashamed <S%H3637><s%> of thy lewd <S%H2154><s%> way <S%H1870><s%>.

Thou hast played the harlot <S%H2181><s%> also with the Assyrians <S%H1121><s%>, because <S%H1115><s%> thou wast insatiable <S%H7646><s%>; yea <S%H2181><s%>, thou hast played the harlot with them <S%H7654><s%>, and yet thou wast not satisfied.

Thou hast moreover multiplied <S%H7235><s%> thy whoredom <S%H8457><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of traffic <S%H3667><s%>, unto Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>; and yet thou wast not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> herewith <S%H2063><s%>.

How weak <S%H535><s%> is thy heart <S%H3826><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, seeing thou doest <S%H6213><s%> all these things <S%H4639><s%>, the work of an impudent7986, Ruth2 harlot <S%H2181><s%>;

in that thou buildest <S%H1129><s%> thy vaulted place <S%H1354><s%> at the head <S%H7218><s%> of every way <S%H1870><s%>, and makest <S%H6213><s%> thy lofty place <S%H7413><s%> in every street <S%H7339><s%>, and hast not been as a harlot <S%H2181><s%>, in that thou scornest <S%H7046><s%> hire <S%H868><s%>.
A wife <S%H802><s%> that committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%>! that taketh <S%H3947><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> instead of her husband <S%H376><s%>!

They give <S%H5414><s%> gifts <S%H5078><s%> to all harlots <S%H2181><s%>; but thou givest <S%H5414><s%> thy gifts <S%H5083><s%> to all thy lovers <S%H157><s%>, and bribest <S%H7809><s%> them <S%H935><s%>, that they may come unto thee on every side <S%H5439><s%> for thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>.

And thou art different <S%H2016><s%> from other women <S%H802><s%> in thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%>, in that none followeth <S%H310><s%> thee to play the harlot <S%H2181><s%>; and whereas thou givest <S%H5414><s%> hire <S%H868><s%>, and no hire <S%H868><s%> is given <S%H5414><s%> unto thee <S%H1961><s%>, therefore thou art different <S%H2016><s%>.
Wherefore <S%H2181><s%>, O harlot, hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>:

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, Because thy filthiness <S%H5178><s%> was poured out <S%H8210><s%>, and thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> uncovered <S%H1540><s%> through thy whoredoms <S%H8457><s%> with thy lovers <S%H157><s%>; and because of all the idols <S%H1544><s%> of thy abominations <S%H8441><s%>, and for the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy children <S%H1121><s%>, that thou didst give unto them <S%H5414><s%>;

therefore behold <S%H6908><s%>, I will gather all thy lovers <S%H157><s%>, with whom thou hast taken pleasure <S%H6149><s%>, and all them that thou hast loved <S%H157><s%>, with all them that thou hast hated <S%H8130><s%>; I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> them against thee on every side <S%H5439><s%>, and will uncover <S%H1540><s%> thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%> unto them <S%H7200><s%>, that they may see all thy nakedness <S%H6172><s%>.

And I will judge <S%H8199><s%> thee <S%H5003><s%>, as women that break wedlock and shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> are judged <S%H4941><s%>; and I will bring <S%H5414><s%> upon thee the blood <S%H1818><s%> of wrath <S%H2534><s%> and jealousy <S%H7068><s%>.

I will also give <S%H5414><s%> thee into their hand <S%H3027><s%>, and they shall throw down <S%H2040><s%> thy vaulted place <S%H1354><s%>, and break down <S%H5422><s%> thy lofty places <S%H7413><s%>; and they shall strip <S%H6584><s%> thee of thy clothes <S%H899><s%>, and take <S%H3947><s%> thy fair <S%H8597><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%>; and they shall leave <S%H3240><s%> thee naked <S%H5903><s%> and bare <S%H6181><s%>.

They shall also bring up <S%H5927><s%> a company <S%H6951><s%> against thee <S%H7275><s%>, and they shall stone thee with stones <S%H68><s%>, and thrust thee through <S%H1333><s%> with their swords <S%H2719><s%>.

And they shall burn <S%H8313><s%> thy houses <S%H1004><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> upon thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> women <S%H802><s%>; and I will cause thee to cease <S%H7673><s%> from playing the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, and thou shalt also give <S%H5414><s%> no hire any more <S%H868><s%>.

So will I cause my wrath <S%H2534><s%> toward thee to rest <S%H5117><s%>, and my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> shall depart <S%H5493><s%> from thee <S%H8252><s%>, and I will be quiet, and will be no more angry <S%H3707><s%>.

Because thou hast not remembered <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, but hast raged <S%H7264><s%> against me in all these things <S%H1887><s%>; therefore, behold, I also will bring <S%H5414><s%> thy way <S%H1870><s%> upon thy head <S%H7218><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: and thou shalt not commit <S%H6213><s%> this lewdness <S%H2154><s%> with all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>.
Behold <S%H4911><s%>, every one that useth proverbs shall use this proverb <S%H4911><s%> against thee <S%H559><s%>, saying, As is the mother <S%H517><s%>, so is her daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

Thou art the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of thy mother <S%H517><s%>, that loatheth <S%H1602><s%> her husband <S%H376><s%> and her children <S%H1121><s%>; and thou art the sister <S%H269><s%> of thy sisters <S%H269><s%>, who loathed <S%H1602><s%> their husbands <S%H582><s%> and their children <S%H1121><s%>: your mother <S%H517><s%> was a Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and your father <S%H1><s%> an Amorite <S%H567><s%>.

And thine elder <S%H1419><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> is Samaria <S%H8111><s%>, that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> at thy left hand <S%H8040><s%>, she and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>; and thy younger <S%H6996><s%> sister <S%H269><s%>, that dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> at thy right hand <S%H3225><s%>, is Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Yet hast thou not walked <S%H1980><s%> in their ways <S%H1870><s%>, nor done <S%H6213><s%> after their abominations <S%H8441><s%>; but <S%H6985><s%>, as if that were a very little <S%H4592><s%> thing <S%H7843><s%>, thou wast more corrupt than they <S%H2004><s%> in all thy ways <S%H1870><s%>.

As I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, Sodom <S%H5467><s%> thy sister <S%H269><s%> hath not done <S%H6213><s%>, she nor her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, as thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>, thou and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

Behold <S%H5771><s%>, this was the iniquity of thy sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%>: pride <S%H1347><s%>, fulness <S%H7653><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and prosperous <S%H7962><s%> ease <S%H8252><s%> was in her and in her daughters <S%H1323><s%>; neither did she strengthen <S%H2388><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>.
And they were haughty <S%H1361><s%>, and committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H5493><s%>: therefore I took them away as I saw good <S%H7200><s%>.

Neither hath Samaria <S%H8111><s%> committed <S%H2398><s%> half <S%H2677><s%> of thy sins <S%H2403><s%>; but thou hast multiplied <S%H7235><s%> thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> more than they <S%H2007><s%>, and hast justified <S%H6663><s%> thy sisters <S%H269><s%> by all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%> which thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>.

Thou also <S%H5375><s%>, bear thou thine own shame <S%H3639><s%>, in that thou hast given judgment <S%H6419><s%> for thy sisters <S%H269><s%>; through thy sins <S%H2403><s%> that thou hast committed more abominable <S%H8581><s%> than they <S%H2004><s%>, they are more righteous <S%H6663><s%> that thou <S%H954><s%>: yea, be thou also confounded, and bear <S%H5375><s%> thy shame <S%H3639><s%>, in that thou hast justified <S%H6663><s%> thy sisters <S%H269><s%>.

And I will turn again <S%H7725><s%> their captivity <S%H7622><s%>, the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and the captivity <S%H7622><s%> of thy captives <S%H7622><s%> in the midst of them <S%H8432><s%>;

that thou mayest bear <S%H5375><s%> thine own shame <S%H3639><s%>, and mayest be ashamed <S%H3637><s%> because of all that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>, in that thou art a comfort unto them <S%H5162><s%>.

And thy sisters <S%H269><s%>, Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%>, shall return <S%H7725><s%> to their former estate <S%H6927><s%>; and Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and her daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to their former estate <S%H6927><s%>; and thou and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> to your former estate <S%H6927><s%>.
For thy sister <S%H269><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%> was not mentioned <S%H8052><s%> by thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of thy pride <S%H1347><s%>,

before thy wickedness <S%H7451><s%> was uncovered <S%H1540><s%>, as at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Syria <S%H758><s%>, and of all that are round about <S%H5439><s%> her <S%H1323><s%>, the daughters of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, that do despite <S%H7590><s%> unto thee round about <S%H5439><s%>.
Thou hast borne <S%H5375><s%> thy lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: I will also deal <S%H6213><s%> with thee as thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>, who hast despised <S%H959><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> in breaking <S%H6565><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Nevertheless I will remember <S%H2142><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with thee in the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy youth <S%H5271><s%>, and I will establish <S%H6965><s%> unto thee an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Then shalt thou remember <S%H2142><s%> thy ways <S%H1870><s%>, and be ashamed <S%H3637><s%>, when thou shalt receive <S%H3947><s%> thy sisters <S%H269><s%>, thine elder <S%H1419><s%> sisters and thy younger <S%H6996><s%>; and I will give <S%H5414><s%> them unto thee for daughters <S%H1323><s%>, but not by thy covenant <S%H1285><s%>.
And I will establish <S%H6965><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> with thee <S%H3045><s%>; and thou shalt know that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>;

that thou mayest remember <S%H2142><s%>, and be confounded <S%H954><s%>, and never open <S%H6610><s%> thy mouth <S%H6310><s%> any more <S%H6440><s%>, because of thy shame <S%H3639><s%>, when I have forgiven <S%H3722><s%> thee all that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
